terms_conditions_acceptance.description: General configs/lex/en/bots Terms and Conditions bot

abort_statement.content: Sorry, I am not able to assist at this time.

clarification_prompt.content:
Sorry, I didn't understand that. Please try again. 
Please answer with a number: 
1. Yes, I accept the terms and conditions. 
2. No, I don't accept the terms and conditions.
